snippet: Fewer than seven million children around the world died before their fifth birthday from disease and birth complications in 2011 — a new low, several agencies announced Wednesday.
abstract: World Health Organization, the United Nations Children’s Fund and other agencies announce a new record low, with fewer than seven million children around the world having died before their fifth birthday.
lead_paragraph: Fewer than seven million children around the world died before their fifth birthday from disease and birth complications in 2011 — a new low, several agencies announced Wednesday.

headline.main: Young Children’s Deaths Said to Drop Again in 2011
headline.print_headline: Young Children’s Deaths Said to Drop Again in 2011
